title: Hi!
text:
I’m Holly, a post-doc at CRUK Beatson Institute in Prof Crispin Miller’s group.
I’m attempting to learn how to properly use Quarto, especially lua, HTML, and CSS. They say the best way to learn is doing… so here’s my attempt at doing. A blog may appear to pretend I’m teaching - let’s see if I get that far!
